i am looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
i was born in france and moved to canada.

participant_2.background:
I grew up with them, and we've been close ever since.
boating is my favorite activity.
i wish i didn t have to work.
I want to change my look to reflect my new single status.
I'm not worried about the weather because I'm inside, listening to music with my friends.

content.text: Hey!  How is your day going?
Good!  Just got back from a boat trip.
No way!  That sounds so fun!  I love boating.
It was, I'm so glad I got to do it.
What do you like about it?
I love being on the water and the feeling of freedom.
I can definitely relate to that.  I grew up in France and would spend my summers on the lake.
That sounds amazing!  I've always wanted to go to France.
You should!  It's a beautiful country.
Maybe I will one day.  I'm looking forward to changing my look to reflect my new single status.
That's great!  I'm sure you'll look amazing.
Thanks!  How are you spending your day?
I'm just hanging out, reading a book and drinking iced coffee.
That sounds nice and relaxing.  I'm going to go make some coffee now.
